alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 5:06PM PST until January 05 at 10:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 7000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
